actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Kalaupapa National Historic Site in the State of Hawaii.

summary.text: Designates the site of the leprosy settlement at or near Kalaupapa on the island of Molokai, Hawaii, for establishment of the Kalaupapa National Historic Site. Authorizes the appropriation of such funds as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Kalaupapa National Historic Site in the State of Hawaii.
